messages.message:
Welcome to the Symbaroum system


We are happy that you are using our system and wish you best of luck.
If you want to give some feedback on the system, the developers are active on both the Foundry Discord (channel #free-league) and Davokar Explorers Discord.

Symbaroum updates to 4.3


We've released Symbaroum for Foundry v4.3

Important note:

If you are on Foundry v9 still - make sure you go to Symbaroum release 3.1.8 and load your world and data, before upgrading to Foundry v11.

This release makes some changes to shields and will migrate your world, but will not update any unlinked actors on the scenes, so you might want to revist them. The change means that shields no longer needs a +1 in the bonus field.

Make a backup

See Foundry tutorial for backups

If you have questions and/or need help, ping us on either on #symbaroum-vtt-foundry on Davokar Explorers Discord or the #free-league channel on Foundry discord.

Symbaroum updates to 4.3.2


There were a couple of bugs in v4.3 with creating items and Enhanced Combat that needed urgent fixing. Please update if you are on Symbaroum version 4.3 or 4.3.1
